Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory170.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: "What are you going to do? Nothing will work against me! Don't you understand?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Everyone was doing their best against the King and his guards, but no one could land the last hit.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "What's going on? He already has an HP bar, but we still can't beat him!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Camu, Vera!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Don't blame us. This is very normal.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Normal?', 3: '12', 4: 'Is this also a system feature?', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Why else would we let Liv create the real artifact?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Right. Some NPCs cannot be defeated by players even if they have an HP bar. The system will "lock" their health.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'The artifact may not be complete, but I already have power! Once I take your artifact away, I will become perfect!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Defend yourselves!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Everybody followed Lucia's order to scatter while continuing to give the King pressure."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Hey, what about me!? Liv and I finally got the real artifact, but what shall I do next!?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Do you really have to ask us? You were the one who used it!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Demon King suddenly remembered something and lifted his head... Well, his entire body was a "head."'}
{3: 'He immediately turned to Liv, who was holding the artifact cluelessly.'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Liv, point the artifact at me, then shout out the name of the mightiest person!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'What? The mightiest person?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: "Yes. Then I'll be able to transform into that person and gain the power to control the system.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Can't you be more specific?", 3: '35', 4: "Can't you just turn into your old form?", 5: '36'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'I already forgot what I looked like when I turned into this. I can only count on you, heroes!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'I already forgot what I looked like when I became like this. I can only count on you, heroes!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'The name of the mightiest person... Hmm.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It seemed to be the most difficult question to Liv. Others might have an answer immediately, but she always saw everybody as equal.'}
{3: "The King's attacks intensified. The heroes could still hold him, but if they could not land the last hit, it would only be a matter of time before they lost."}
{2: 'Just shout Overlord!', 3: '48', 4: 'Have faith in yourself, Liv!', 5: '55'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Overlord... Right, this is the "Land of Overlord." The Overlord must be the mightiest!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv took a deep breath in, then pointed the artifact toward the Demon King and shouted the name.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Overlord Celica!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Wait, why Celica!?'}
{3: 'A concerned look appeared on Liv as I asked.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I've been reading Miss Celica's novel recently... So I accidentally...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'I had no idea what the novel was about, but the artifact seemed to be working.'}
{3: "Liv was worried that the name she shouted wasn't the best. I told her to trust her choice."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "There's no time to waste!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv took a deep breath in, then pointed the artifact toward the Demon King and shouted the name.'}
{3: 'Wait, why Celica!?'}
{3: 'Knowing that I was baffled by her choice, Liv turned to me and explained.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Miss Celica once said she was the best of best.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The best of best didn't make sense to me, but the artifact seemed to be working."}
{1: '1', 2: 'King', 3: 'What is this light...!?', 4: '1'}
